name: Monkey Time (CreatorCreepy)
description:
Monkey Time is an 8-bit platformer about a Monkey going on an adventure to collect Bananas! There is a timer for speedrunning, try to get the fastest time!

Game includes:

- 2 Bossfights

- 4 Levels

-  Monkey

Enjoy!

Speedrun Guide: https://bit.ly/2WEuyZi

IMPORTANT: When playing the game for the first time, select "Reset" instead of "Continue", otherwise many featured of the game won't work, such as the timer and the world map.
